page.title: 10Playing out 1985
page.content: We did a survey of what people call playing out and which things they did most often.The most popular was bike riding which was chosen by 12 people .Then next most popular was making dens chosen by 7 people.Netball was next with 6 people then swimming with five people and play fights with four people. Lots of people in Finchingfield play in the pond.Sometimes they have stone fights and mud fights,they ride bikes quite a lot.I like it best when we play with boomerangs and frisbys. It is also quite good when we play cricket and football.We play rounders and dabber(a local Braintree area name for "He")also we play army in the churchyard. Sometimes we make dens and have water fights.
